CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Account.Sales_Territory__c), "Central", "Central", "Midwest", "Midwest", "Northeast", "Northeast", "South", "South", "Southeast", "Southeast", "West", "West", "East", "East", "Canada", "Canada", "Latin America", "Latin America", "Mexico", "Mexico", "Rest of World", "Rest of World", "None")
CustomField.label: Customer Region
